attributes.action: allow the international rapper Snoop Dogg to continue his European tour in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"US rapper Snoop Dogg has been denied a visa to enter the UK on a European tour alongside P Diddy.

The controversial star was due to play in London on Tuesday followed by gigs in Manchester, Glasgow, Cardiff and Nottingham. 

The performer accepted a police caution last year after being arrested on suspicion of violent disorder and affray at Heathrow Airport.  

She added: "Snoop and his team are hoping the British Government will reconsider this decision, especially as he has toured here before and sees the UK as being the highlight of the tour. 

"He has asked how he can help rectify the situation and would happily talk to and give assurances to officials." 

The Foreign and Commonwealth Office said it could not comment on individual cases"

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
